description: Engineering Student in Web and App development looking to participate in a project lasting 3 months to a year.
setec: Full stack developer at Terrasol Sectec
setec_desc: 6-month internship to help develop a genuine operating system dedicated to geotechnical engineering. The frontend development was done in react and the backend in java
fcp_desc: 3-month internship to design and update a website (HTML, CSS, PHP). data recovery (phpmyadmin) with SQL queries.
graph_desc: Project responding to a request from the company Orange with the objective of setting up a data visualization and processing Website using the vue.js framework. We used the mongodb database to store the data, which is processed at the backend level using nodejs.
flutter_desc: Development of a mobile application in Dart Flutter. Learning design methods for login, home and profile pages, all linked to the firebase database in order to obtain a stable version of the application on android and IOS devices.
eirbmon_desc: Project aimed at implementing a website in order to set up a system for buying/selling NFTs which can be used in a video game coded with Unity (C#).
bombeirb_desc: Group project in C and SDL to produce a reproduction of the Bomberman video game.
hobbies_txt: I am a 23 years old engineering student with a passion for web development. It's been one year since I started working out. Apart from web development, I love having parties with my friends, play video games and listening to music. Here is a short excerpt from my musical personality on the right.
